description: Students study selected writers of the Eastern Caribbean islands of Barbados, Trinidad, Saint Lucia and others. The study of literature is supplemented by guest lectures and speakers, as well as field trips to sites of cultural and environmental interest. Accommodation includes stays in private homes. Offered periodically during Interim. Prerequisite: FYW.
name: Lit Eastern Caribbean
notes: This is an off-campus course. You will find this course listed in Studio Abroad
title: Literature of the Eastern Caribbean
